steps.title: Fill a bowl with warm water.
steps.content: Fill a bowl with warm water. The bowl should be larger than the jelly mould.

steps.title: Place the mould in the warm water.
steps.content: Place the mould in the warm water. Be careful not to submerse the jelly!

steps.title: Allow to stand for just a few seconds and then remove.
steps.content: Allow to stand for just a few seconds and then remove. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Turn out the jelly.
steps.content: Turn out the jelly. It should keep its shape perfectly. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Fill a bowl with hot water.
steps.content: Fill a bowl with hot water.

steps.title: Dip the jelly mould into the hot water three times.
steps.content: Dip the jelly mould into the hot water three times.

steps.title: Place on a firm bench.
steps.content: Place on a firm bench. Press the jelly around the edge, using your finger. Gently pull away from the edge around the whole jelly.

steps.title: Turn the jelly mould onto a plate.
steps.content: Turn the jelly mould onto a plate. Place your hands over both the base of the plate and the base of the mould. Shake quickly and sharply and the jelly should release. [3] X Research source
